text: Randell van der Steen (born 14 May 1995) is a Dutch korfball player. He plays with Blauw-Wit in the Dutch national Korfbal League. Van der Steen helped Gerald van Dijk founding the Suriname national korfball team. Van der Steen is the captain of the national team of Suriname. With the national team he competed among others at the 2019 World Championships and 2022 World Games in Birmingham, Alabama. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Surinamese korfball players Category:Dutch korfball players
title: Randell van der Steen
